peachbox.pipeline package¶

Submodules¶

peachbox.pipeline.pipeline module¶

class peachbox.pipeline.pipeline.Pipeline[source]¶

Bases: object

Base class for data pipelines. >>> class ExamplePipelineImplementation(peachbox.pipelines.Pipeline): >>> def __init__(object): >>> # connector can be pre-defined or manually defined >>> self.source = peachbox.connector.source.JSON() >>> # MasterDataSet: model has target, which is determined by partition_time_range >>> self.sink = peachbox.connector.sink.MasterDataSet(model=ReviewEdge) >>> >>> # param are passed to source and sink beforehand >>> # super class has execute(): Sets params in connectors and sends out “ImportReviewsFinished” >>> def _execute(self): >>> df = self.source.data_frame() >>> reviews = df.validate([‘user_id’, ‘product_id’, ‘time’]) >>> .map(lambda entry: ReviewEdge(user_id=entry[‘user_id’], >>> product_id=entry[‘product_id’], >>> true_as_of_seconds=entry[‘time’]) >>> self.sink.absorb(reviews) >>> >>> # optional: is called by execute() >>> def tear_down(self): >>> pass
